metadata.inclusion:
1. Turn bulb OFF, then ON three times. The bulb rapidly flashes four times to indicate classic mode.
2. The bulb flashes twice to confirm inclusion.
metadata.exclusion: Turn bulb OFF, then ON three times. The bulb flashes twice when removed.
metadata.reset:
1. Starting with the bulb on, turn the switch off, pause one second, then turn back ON.
2. Repeat three times (four times total).
3. The bulb flashes twice when reset.
